greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of times n must be differentiated to reach 0.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: dtn[ L_ ] := Fold[ 2#1+#2&, 0, L ]; f[ n_ ] := dtn[ Map[ Abs[ #[ [ 1 ] ]-#[ [ 2 ] ] ]&, Partition[ IntegerDigits[ n, 2 ], 2, 1 ] ] ]; g[ n_ ] := Length[ FixedPointList[ f, n ] ]-2; Table[ g[ n ], {n, 0, 120} ]
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
